Pioneer 3L Lab Freeze Dryer

Laboratory Freeze Dryers

Entry-level benchtop unit for routine R&D tasks.

Laboratory freeze-dryer, which handles product capacities from 2.5 kg to 24 kg per drying cycle.

  • The Model is particularly suited to standard applications in round-bottomed or similar flasks and small quantities in product trays and other containers.

  • Almost all models are available with ice condenser temperatures -60°C, –85 °C and –105 °C (for products with low freezing points, e.g. solvents).

  • IOT Remote accessable of Cell Phone,refer to IOT remote doc.

Pioneer Technical features

Based on SJ 14 years of experience and technology in the research, development and production of freeze-drying machines, the Pioneer laboratory freeze-dryer’s performance, stability, and control system all reach the top industry standards:

  • Ice Capacity range from 2L to 12L

  • Condenser Temperature:-60℃,-85℃ or -105 ℃ to meet a variety of applications

  • 7 inch touch-control system,simple operation.

  • Display Critical data: condenser temperature,sample temperautre and vacuum;display graph and data recording. vacuum and temperature correction to ensure long-term accuracy in use.

  • Power-off auto-recovery function: Allows customers to set the power-off restart time Alarm and prompt functions to prevent mis-operation.

  • Optional mobile phone/computer remote monitoring.

Ice Condenser


304 stainless steel construction
InnerCoil or outside Coil
Optional corrosion-resistant coating
One-touch electric defrosting
Automatic isolation valves for condenser and vacuum pump
Prevents oil backflow and system contamination

Vacuum System

Electrically actuated vent solenoid valve between condenser and pump

Automatic vacuum pump start/stop to prevent liquid ingress

Integrated vacuum filter for pump protection

High-precision vacu

um sensor

Programmable vacuum control via gas inlet regulation
